## TikTok Hashtag Strategies for Pirate Adventure Content in 2024

### Book-Related Hashtags
For book content creators focusing on pirate adventure stories, #booktok, #bookish, and #bookrecommendations are popular hashtags. You can also create a unique hashtag for your book and encourage your readers to use it when sharing their thoughts or making a review on it.

### Adventure-Themed Hashtags
For adventure content, you can go for hashtags like #offthebeatenpath or #adrenalinejunkie to target audiences interested in adventurous escapes. Include a few highly popular travel hashtags to maximize reach (#traveltiktok, #adventure), but also incorporate some mid-range and niche hashtags relevant to your specific travel offerings.

### Strategic Best Practices for 2024

**Hashtag Quantity**: Travel marketing agencies and destination marketing companies should be very careful about the choice of hashtags, possibly no more than 10-15 hashtags. There is no golden rule for how many hashtags you should use on TikTok. However, keep in mind that the current caption length on TikTok is capped at 2,200 characters.

**Mix Strategy**: Don't just rely on the most popular hashtags on TikTok. Striking a balance is key. Include a few highly popular travel hashtags to maximize reach (#traveltiktok, #adventure), but also incorporate some mid-range and niche hashtags relevant to your specific travel offerings (#luxurytravel, #solofemaletravel). This ensures you reach a broad audience while also attracting highly engaged viewers who share your travel niche.

### Content Strategy Recommendations

**Interactive Storytelling**: Interactive storytelling. This kind of content involves allowing viewers to influence the plot or characters by engaging with your videos. Not only does this help you build your audience, but it also encourages viewers to check out your book to see the full story.

**Behind-the-Scenes Content**: Behind-the-scenes. Offer a BTS look at your writing process. Share your journey, challenges, and successes as you work on your book. This personal connection can help you build a strong bond with your target audience, making them more likely to support your work.

### Performance Tracking
Don't set your hashtags and forget it! Keep an eye on your video analytics and see which hashtags are performing best. This data helps you refine your strategy over time, identifying the hashtags that truly resonate with your target audience.

### BookTok Community Impact
BookTok helped sell around 20 million books in 2021, which represented over 2.4% of the total book sales for the year, and The BookTok hashtag currently stands at over 175 billion views, with videos featuring books old and new. BookTok has helped revitalize backlist books and sent debut authors to bestseller lists.
